author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the cooked noodles into a large bowl with the red pepper and pineapple. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger and chilli flakes until well combined. To serve, pour the dressing over the noodles and stir. Transfer to a serving bowl.
ingredients: 85g/3oz udon noodles, cooked according to packet instructions and drained,  ½ red pepper, seeds removed, chopped,  55g/2oz fresh pineapple flesh, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  2 tsp sesame oil,  2.5cm/1in piece root ginger, finely chopped,  ½ tsp chilli flakes
